description: Grated haloumi takes these golden, crispy corn fritters to new heights. Try them today - they could become your new favourite breakfast or easy lunch recipe.
keywords: Fritters,Pescatarian,Deep fryer,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Video,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mar 2021,Autumn
name: Corn & Haloumi Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 spring onions, thinly sliced (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk flour, egg and soda water in a large bowl until smooth and combined. Stand for 10 minutes.
Fold in haloumi, onion, parsley and corn.

Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Place 4 x 1/4 cups mixture in pan. Cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack set over a baking tray. Repeat with remaining batter, adding more oil, if necessary.
Serve fritters with extra onion and relish.
